text: Sanya Dharmasakti (April 5, 1907 â€“ January 6, 2002) was a Thai jurist, university professor and politician. He served as the 12th Prime Minister of Thailand from 1973 to 1975. Sanya Dharmasakti was one of the most influential figures in the politics of Thailand. Dharmasakti died on January 6, 2002 in Bangkok, Thailand at the age of 94. title: Sanya Dharmasakti
